description: DEPRECATED - { deprecation-message } - { deprecated-since } - { deprecated-removed-in } - { deprecated-replacement } - Specifies set of values for the uom field in a QuantityElement, expressed as a 2- or 3-character length unit code, relevant for technical industries, apparel, etc., note: from UN/CEFACT Rec. 20, e.g., 'MTR' for 'metre'.
title: Unit codes for length, based on UN/CEFACT Rec. 20
